self = <check_left_bt.Check_left_buttons testMethod=test_buttons>
css = '#left-sidebar > div.left-sidebar--sticky-container.js-sticky-leftnav > nav > ol > li:nth-child(1) > a', next_url = 'https://stackoverflow.com/', bt_name = 'Home'

    def click_button(self, css, next_url, bt_name=''):
        step_name = 'Verify button'
        if bt_name:
            step_name += f' "{bt_name.strip()}"'
        with allure.step(step_name):
            bt = self.wait.until(EC.visibility_of_element_located((
                By.CSS_SELECTOR,
                css
            )))
    
        step_name = 'Clicking to button'
        if bt_name:
            step_name += f' "{bt_name.strip()}"'
        with allure.step(step_name):
            bt.click()
